<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete custom field values for tickets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/values/for/tickets/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes custom field values for one or more tickets. This endpoint allows targeted deletion using custom field IDs and/or ticket IDs.

**Key Behavior**:
- When `CustomFieldIds` is specified: Only deletes values for those specific custom field types
- When `IncludePkIds` is specified: Only deletes values for those specific tickets
- When `ExcludePkIds` is specified: Protects those tickets from deletion even if they match other criteria
- The endpoint returns the count of custom field values deleted

**Prerequisites**:
1. **CustomFieldIds** (optional) - Obtain from [POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields](/docs/api/custom-fields/search-custom-fields) response `Items[].CustomFieldId`
2. **IncludePkIds** (optional) - Ticket IDs from [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) response `Items[].TicketId`

**Workflow Example**:
1. To delete a specific custom field value from specific tickets: POST with `{"CustomFieldIds": ["field-uuid"], "IncludePkIds": ["ticket-uuid-1", "ticket-uuid-2"]}`
2. To delete all custom field values from a specific ticket: POST with `{"IncludePkIds": ["ticket-uuid"]}`
3. To delete a custom field from all tickets except specific ones: POST with `{"CustomFieldIds": ["field-uuid"], "ExcludePkIds": ["protected-ticket-uuid"]}`

**Minimal Required Fields**: At least one of CustomFieldIds, IncludePkIds, or ExcludePkIds

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for deleting custom field values. Supports targeting specific custom fields and/or specific entity records through include/exclude lists.","properties":{"CustomFieldIds":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of custom field IDs to delete values for. When specified, only values for these custom fields are deleted. When null/empty, all custom field values matching the entity filters are deleted.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchCustomFields","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields","responseField":"Items[].CustomFieldId"}},"IncludePkIds":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of entity IDs (AssetId, TicketId, UserId, EventId) to delete custom field values for. When specified, only custom field values for these entities are deleted. Use this to target specific records."},"ExcludePkIds":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of entity IDs to exclude from deletion. Custom field values for these entities will NOT be deleted even if they match other criteria. Use this to protect specific records when doing bulk deletes."}},"example":{"CustomFieldIds":["e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089"],"IncludePkIds":["546f841c-32d8-47e5-bfc1-a4f21754d6d3"],"ExcludePkIds":[]},"title":"DeleteCustomFieldValuesRequest"},"examples":{"deleteSpecificField":{"summary":"Delete specific custom field from specific tickets","description":"Removes one custom field from two tickets","value":{"CustomFieldIds":["abefec53-0823-4909-9d69-fdedebc46035"],"IncludePkIds":["622760c9-8ba3-f011-8e61-6045bd85293b","00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"]}},"deleteAllFieldsFromTicket":{"summary":"Delete all custom fields from one ticket","description":"Removes all custom field values from a single ticket","value":{"IncludePkIds":["622760c9-8ba3-f011-8e61-6045bd85293b"]}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
